lines.text: [Rockford is trying to convince his client to go undercover]
How much of my own money am I going to earn back?
I usually pay my operatives 20 bucks an hour for this kind of thing.
I wouldn't do it for less than 50.
You aren't afraid of him are you?
No, what I am sonny, is about fifty pounds heavier and one hell of a lot meaner so you better straighten up your act, I don't think I like you.
You got to be one of the dumbest looking apes I ever saw.
You know what's wrong with karate Jerry? It's based on the ridiculous assumption that the other guy will fight fair.
Billings. LAPD. You know Thursday is Chapman's 20th year and we're giving a little surprise party at the Captain's. I think you should come. By the way, we need 5 bucks for the present.
